name: Blog Address Change
description: Currently our blog is located at blog.durandal.io. That's a bit odd considering all the content here is directly related to Aurelia. So, we'll be moving the blog to blog.aurelia.io this coming week. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. Thanks!
content: Currently our blog is located at `blog.durandal.io`. That's a bit odd considering all the content here is directly related to Aurelia. So, we'll be moving the blog to `blog.aurelia.io` this coming week. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. Thanks!
